name: gouvernail
description: Autocomplete code using Fabrice Bellard's AI API. (see https://textsynth.com)

enumDescriptions: GPT-J is a language model with 6 billion parameters trained on the Pile (825 GB of text data) published by EleutherAI. Its main language is English but it is also fluent in several other languages. It is also trained on several computer languages.
Boris is a fine tuned version of GPT-J for the French language. Use this model is you want the best performance with the French language.
Fairseq GPT 13B is an English language model with 13 billion parameters. Its training corpus is less diverse than GPT-J but it has better performance at least on pure English language tasks.
GPT-NeoX-20B is the largest publically available English language model with 20 billion parameters. It was trained on the same corpus as GPT-J.

gouvernail.token.markdownDescription: Textsynth API Key. **You need to reload VSCode or the extension after configuring this.**

gouvernail.maxTokens.description: Max tokens (group of 4 char) which can be generated by the API.

gouvernail.requestInterval.description: Minimum time, in ms, between each request to the API. There is no request while the content of the file is not modified.

gouvernail.autoTriggerCompletion.markdownDescription: If true, the editor will periodically ask the API to get suggestions. If false, the editor will ask the API only when Inline Suggestions are triggered.
